}
.overlay {
  position: absolute; 
  bottom: 0;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* Black see-through */
  color: #f1f1f1; 
  width: 100%;
  transition: .5s ease;
  opacity:0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  padding: 10px;
  text-align: center;
}
.container:hover .overlay {
  opacity: 1;
}

/* columns */

}

  width: 50%;
  padding-right: 20px:
}

  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}
